msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'release-3-0-3'.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'branch-3-0-3'.

author: grisha
msg: Gearing up for 3.0.3

author: bnicholes
msg: Added support for Novell LDAP SDK SSL and standardized the SSL support across
the various LDAP SDKs. Isolated the SSL functionality to mod_ldap rather than
speading it across mod_auth_ldap and mod_ldap. Also added LDAPTrustedCA
and LDAPTrustedCAType directives to allow for a more common method of
specifying the SSL certificate.
Backported to v2.0 from v2.1

author: grisha
msg: Reproduced and fixed the bug with headers out not going out if there was
a handler registered prior to fixup and mod_dir was used. It turnes out
that ap_internal_fast_redirect replaces pointers to headers_out and other
tables inside request, so the mod_python request object created prior to
fast_redirect gets left with stale pointers. Added a bit of code to always
make sure that we are using current tables.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by: The bug discovered by and test case created by Geert Jansen
Reviewed by:
